long_description: The extra-tough Outdoor Research Expedition Crocodile(R) gaiters are built to endure harsh temperatures, rough terrain and use with crampons when you're high on a mountaintop. Extra circumference around the entire leg allows for the thick layers of clothing worn in extreme conditions; sized to fit over plastic or leather mountaineering boots. 3-layer Gore-Tex(R) nylon uppers offer waterproof, breathable protection; lined with Cordura(R) nylon for durability. Super abrasion-resistant Cordura(R) nylon lowers are lined with nylon packcloth to deflect nicks from crampons. Rip-and-stick front openings allow quick on/off; upper edge cinch straps with rip-and-stick closure ensure gaiters stay up, even in deep snow. Rugged BioThane(R) webbing instep straps with buckles secures the fit; instep straps are replaceable. Average weight of the Outdoor Research Expedition Crocodile gaiters: 12.1 oz. per pair.
short_description: The extra-tough Outdoor Research Expedition Crocodile(R) gaiters are built to endure harsh temperatures, rough terrain and use with crampons when you're high on a mountaintop.
